# 印度纳迪叶

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yindu-nadiye
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yindu-nadiye
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yindu-nadiye
yindu-nadiye <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yindu-nadiye
yindu-nadiye <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
